name: Styx: The Goddess of the River
name_original: Styx: The Goddess of the River
description: You play as Styx, goddess of the River... the River of Styx. It is a "Terminal management game" where you manage the entryway to the afterlife and must make sure that the Human souls get to the correct boat safely. While you manage the terminal for Hades, the God of the Underworld your ultimate objective is to earn enough reputation to become one of the most well know and respected gods of all Greek mythology and eventually join Zeus by his side.
